value:
$WmMPID_花嫁タニス,ch09_12_Tanis_F_Wedding19,Face|I agreed to put this on for the festival,
but...marriage and I have nothing to
do with each other.$k$pMy duty is to protect the apostle.
I am an expert in the ways of the
sword, not...well, anything else.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ルイーズ,ch03_22_Luise_F_Wedding19,Face|I'm not so different. Singing, dancing,
reciting verse... I could never hope to
compete with other women there.$k$pI do, however, know how to use my
bow. I told Lord Pent I would use it
to protect him, and I won his heart.$k$pBeing able to protect the one you
love...is something worth striving for.$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁タニス,ch09_12_Tanis_F_Wedding19,Face|I...think I see what you mean...$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ルイーズ,ch03_22_Luise_F_Wedding19,Face|I think you will do fine to continue on
the path you are on now, and keep
training with the blade.$k$pThen you can demonstrate your
superb battle technique to your
future husband!$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁タニス,ch09_12_Tanis_F_Wedding19,Face|I-I suppose I could do that...$k$pAh, who am I kidding—that will never
happen...$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_花嫁タニス,ch09_12_Tanis_F_Wedding19,Face|I-I haven't lost yet! Ugh...$k$p$WmMPID_花嫁ルイーズ,ch03_22_Luise_F_Wedding19,Face|Don't be reckless! Let's go join up
with Lord Pent and the others.$k$p$Sbs150|
